journey.name: findNearbyCafes_withTimeCheck
journey.description: Test finding nearby cafes from the ride detail screen and verifies the ride duration.

actions.action: Given the user is on the main dashboard
Click the white "play" button on the middle left side of the screen to start a ride and the play button turns from white to gray
Icons and the background turns to color to show the ride is in progress
Click on the bike icon between the start and stop buttons this opens a dialog box
The green bike icon starts moving along the gray bar
Click on the weather icon on the top right corner of the screen then the full weather is shown
Click the stop button to end the ride then the end button turns gray and play button is white
When the user taps on the 'Trips' tab in the bottom navigation
And the user taps on a specific ride from the list
And the user taps the 'cafe' button on the top left corner of the green map
Then the user sees circle icons of nearby cafes on the green map
